reviewText:
The director has the right idea this time.  The main problem is "We wanted to see everything.  Not only her top.
She has nice body and pretty face.  Let us see everything.  The photos are better than the movie. Please set her free. Let her performe the right way.  Everybody Happy

Yua Aida in Asian Beauty Vol. 15 is a well-photographed, beautifully laid soundtrack of this beautiful buxom model and Japanese porn star who retired only a year and a half ago.  She has a freedom and naturalness and an ease of displaying her very beautiful body in all sorts of costumes.  This is Japanese erotica at its best.  Yua is probably a 35-D, but the boobies are natural and firm, quite exciting, and eliciting a hunger for wanting to suckle.  The movie length is about right otherwise you'd lose your heightend state of awareness developed over the course of enjoying the many facets of Yua.  Of course, my favorite scene is her wearing all black lingerie -- the fishnets and thong making her a "bad little good girl."  She's at her seductive best -- kinda like the girlfriend you'd like to have who could entertain you for hours role playing to your fantasies. This DVD is erotic, not X-rated so you can't really play doctor with her. But still the same, enjoy her beauty and naturalness.  She's not an angel, but close to it.
